summary.span: 表示内存中数据的一个表。

span.span: Represents one table of in-memory data.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是 ADO.NET 库中的中心对象。The is a central object in the ADO.NET library. 使用 的其他对象包括 和 。Other objects that use the include the and the . 在访问 对象时，请注意，它们具有条件区分大小写。When accessing objects, note that they are conditionally case sensitive. 例如，如果一个 名为 "mydatatable"，另一个名为 "Mydatatable"，则用于搜索其中一个表的字符串被视为区分大小写。For example, if one is named "mydatatable" and another is named "Mydatatable", a string used to search for one of the tables is regarded as case sensitive. 但是，如果 "mydatatable" 存在并且 "Mydatatable" 不是，则搜索字符串将被视为不区分大小写。However, if "mydatatable" exists and "Mydatatable" does not, the search string is regarded as case insensitive. 可以包含两个 对象，这些对象具有相同的 属性值，但 属性值不同。A can contain two objects that have the same property value but different property values. 有关使用 对象的详细信息，请参阅[创建 DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable)。For more information about working with objects, see [Creating a DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/creating-a-datatable). 如果要以编程方式创建 ，则必须先通过将 对象添加到 来定义其架构（通过 属性访问）。If you are creating a programmatically, you must first define its schema by adding objects to the (accessed through the property). 有关添加 对象的详细信息，请参阅[将列添加到 DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable)。For more information about adding objects, see [Adding Columns to a DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-columns-to-a-datatable). 若要将行添加到 ，必须先使用 方法返回新的 对象。To add rows to a , you must first use the method to return a new object. 方法返回具有 架构的行，因为它是由表的 定义的。The method returns a row with the schema of the , as it is defined by the table's . 可以存储的最大行数为16777216。The maximum number of rows that a can store is 16,777,216. 有关详细信息，请参阅[将数据添加到 DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable)。For more information, see [Adding Data to a DataTable](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/adding-data-to-a-datatable). 还包含 对象的集合，这些对象可用于确保数据的完整性。The also contains a collection of objects that can be used to ensure the integrity of the data. 有关详细信息，请参阅[DataTable 约束](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints)。For more information, see [DataTable Constraints](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/datatable-constraints). 有许多 事件可用于确定对表进行更改的时间。There are many events that can be used to determine when changes are made to a table. 其中包括 、、 和 。These include , , , and . 有关可与 一起使用的事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理 DataTable 事件](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-datatable-events)。For more information about the events that can be used with a , see [Handling DataTable Events](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/handling-datatable-events). 创建 的实例后，某些读/写属性将设置为初始值。When an instance of is created, some of the read/write properties are set to initial values. 有关这些值的列表，请参阅 构造函数主题。For a list of these values, see the constructor topic. > [!NOTE] > 和 对象从 继承，并支持 .NET Framework 远程处理的 接口。The and objects inherit from , and support the interface for .NET Framework remoting. 这些是唯一可用于 .NET Framework 远程处理的 ADO.NET 对象。These are the only ADO.NET objects that you can use for .NET Framework remoting. ## Examples 下面的示例创建两个 对象和一个 对象，并将新对象添加到 。The following example creates two objects and one object, and adds the new objects to a . 然后，将在 控件中显示这些表。The tables are then displayed in a control. [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataTable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataTable Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataTable Example/VB/source.vb#1)] 此示例演示如何使用特定的架构定义手动创建 DataTable：This sample demonstrates how to create a DataTable manually with specific schema definitions: - 创建多个 DataTable 并定义初始列。Create multiple DataTables and define the initial columns. - 创建表约束。Create the table constraints. - 插入值并显示表。Insert the values and display the tables. - 创建表达式列并显示表。Create the expression columns and display the tables. C#可以在[开发人员代码示例](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/How-to-create-DataTable-7abb4914)中找到带有此代码示例的 Visual Basic 项目。C# and Visual Basic projects with this code sample can be found on [Developer Code Samples](https://code.msdn.microsoft.com/How-to-create-DataTable-7abb4914). remarks.format: ## Remarks 定义两个表之间的关系的 。A defines the relationship between two tables. 通常，两个表通过包含相同数据的单个字段进行链接。Typically, two tables are linked through a single field that contains the same data. 例如，包含地址数据的表可能包含一个字段，其中包含表示国家/地区的代码。For example, a table which contains address data may have a single field containing codes that represent countries/regions. 包含国家/地区数据的第二个表中将包含一个字段，其中包含标识该国家/地区的代码，并将此代码插入到第一个表中的相应字段。A second table that contains country/region data will have a single field that contains the code that identifies the country/region, and it is this code which is inserted into the corresponding field in the first table. 然后 包含至少四个信息片段：（1）第一个表的名称，（2）第一个表中的列名称，（3）第二个表的名称，（4）第二个表中的列名称。A , then, contains at least four pieces of information: (1) the name of the first table, (2) the column name in the first table, (3) the name of the second table, and (4) the column name in the second table. ## Examples 下面的示例使用 属性返回 中的每个子 。The following example uses the property to return each child in a . 然后，每个关系在 的 方法中用作参数，以返回行的数组。Each relation is then used as an argument in the method of the to return an array of rows. 然后打印该行中每列的值。The value of each column in the row is then printed. remarks.format: ## Remarks `expression` 参数需要聚合函数。The `expression` parameter requires an aggregate function. 例如，下面是一个合法表达式：For example, the following is a legal expression: `Count(Quantity)` 但此表达式不是：But this expression is not: `Sum (Quantity * UnitPrice)` 如果必须对两个或更多个列执行操作，则应创建一个 ，将其 属性设置为相应的表达式，并对生成的列使用聚合表达式。If you must perform an operation on two or more columns, you should create a , set its property to an appropriate expression, and use an aggregate expression on the resulting column. 在这种情况下，假定名称为 "total" 的 ，并将 属性设置为：In that case, given a with the name "total", and the property set to this: `"Quantity * UnitPrice"` 然后， 方法的 expression 参数将如下所示：The expression argument for the method would then be this: `Sum(total)` 第二个参数 `filter`确定在表达式中使用哪些行。The second parameter, `filter`, determines which rows are used in the expression. 例如，如果表中包含名为 "colDate" 的日期列，则可以使用以下表达式限制行：For example, if the table contains a date column named "colDate", you could limit the rows with the following expression: `colDate > 1/1/99 AND colDate < 17/1/99` 有关为这两个参数创建表达式的规则，请参阅 属性。For rules on creating expressions for both parameters, see the property. ## Examples 下面的示例将名为 "Total" 的列的值与标识号为5的销售人员的值求和。The following example sums the values of a column named "Total", for the salesperson whose identification number is five. remarks.format: ## Remarks 限制在删除或更新列中的值时执行的操作。A restricts the action performed when a value in a column (or columns) is either deleted or updated. 此类约束旨在与主键列一起使用。Such a constraint is intended to be used with primary key columns. 在两个表之间的父/子关系中，从父表中删除某个值可能会以下列方式之一影响子行。In a parent/child relationship between two tables, deleting a value from the parent table can affect the child rows in one of the following ways. - 还可以删除子行（级联操作）。The child rows can also be deleted (a cascading action). - 子列中的值可以设置为 null 值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to null values. - 子列中的值可以设置为默认值。The values in the child column (or columns) can be set to default values. - 可以生成异常。An exception can be generated. 尝试将主键中的值设置为非唯一值时， 会变为活动状态。A becomes active when attempting to set a value in a primary key to a non-unique value. ## Examples 下面的示例将 添加到约束的集合。The following example adds a to the collection of constraints. remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用 使用现有的表架构向表中添加一行，但对于行使用默认值，并将 设置为 `Detached`。Calling adds a row to the table using the existing table schema, but with default values for the row, and sets the to `Detached`. 调用 会保留现有 以及行中的其他值。Calling preserves the existing along with other values in the row. 如果作为参数传递的 `DataRow` 处于分离状态，则将其忽略，并且不会引发异常。If the `DataRow` that is passed as a parameter is in a detached state, it is ignored, and no exception is thrown. 新行将添加到数据表的末尾。The new row will be added to the end of the data table. 如果新行违反约束，则不会将其添加到数据表。If the new row violates a Constraint it won't be added to the data table. 可以获取新行的索引，其形式为 DataTable. IndexOf 和 DataTable。You can get the index of the new row with as DataTable.Rows.Find and DataTable.Rows.IndexOf. 有关更多信息，请参见和。See and for more information.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Load` 方法可用于几种常见方案，它们都围绕从指定数据源获取数据并将其添加到当前数据容器（在本例中为 `DataTable`）。The `Load` method can be used in several common scenarios, all centered around getting data from a specified data source and adding it to the current data container (in this case, a `DataTable`). 这些方案描述了 `DataTable`的标准用法，描述了其更新和合并行为。These scenarios describe standard usage for a `DataTable`, describing its update and merge behavior. `DataTable` 使用单个主数据源同步或更新。A `DataTable` synchronizes or updates with a single primary data source. `DataTable` 跟踪更改，允许与主数据源同步。The `DataTable` tracks changes, allowing synchronization with the primary data source. 此外，`DataTable` 可以接受来自一个或多个辅助数据源的增量数据。In addition, a `DataTable` can accept incremental data from one or more secondary data sources. `DataTable` 不负责跟踪更改，以允许与辅助数据源同步。The `DataTable` isn't responsible for tracking changes in order to allow synchronization with the secondary data source. 假设有这两个假设数据源，用户可能需要以下行为之一：Given these two hypothetical data sources, a user is likely to require one of the following behaviors: - 从主数据源中初始化 `DataTable`。Initialize `DataTable` from a primary data source. 在这种情况下，用户想要使用主数据源中的值初始化空 `DataTable`。In this scenario, the user wants to initialize an empty `DataTable` with values from the primary data source. 稍后，用户打算将更改传播回主数据源。Later the user intends to propagate changes back to the primary data source. - 保留更改并从主数据源重新同步。Preserve changes and re-synchronize from the primary data source. 在这种情况下，用户希望将 `DataTable` 填充到前面的方案中，并执行与主数据源的增量同步，同时保留在 `DataTable`中所做的修改。In this scenario, the user wants to take the `DataTable` filled in the previous scenario and perform an incremental synchronization with the primary data source, preserving modifications made in the `DataTable`. - 来自辅助数据源的增量数据馈送。Incremental data feed from secondary data sources. 在这种情况下，用户想要合并一个或多个辅助数据源的更改，并将这些更改传播回主数据源。In this scenario, the user wants to merge changes from one or more secondary data sources, and propagate those changes back to the primary data source. `Load` 方法可以实现所有这些方案。The `Load` method makes all these scenarios possible. 此方法的所有重载（除重载外）都允许指定 load option 参数，指示 中的行与正在加载的行合并的方式。All but one of the overloads for this method allows you to specify a load option parameter, indicating how rows already in a combine with rows being loaded. （不允许您指定行为的重载使用默认加载选项。）下表描述了 枚举提供的三个加载选项。(The overload that doesn't allow you to specify the behavior uses the default load option.) The following table describes the three load options provided by the enumeration. 在每种情况下，说明指示传入数据中行的主键与现有行的主键匹配时的行为。In each case, the description indicates the behavior when the primary key of a row in the incoming data matches the primary key of an existing row. |Load 选项Load Option|说明Description| |-----------------|-----------------| |`PreserveChanges`（默认值）`PreserveChanges` (default)|用传入行的值更新行的原始版本。Updates the original version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`OverwriteChanges`|用传入行的值更新行的当前版本和原始版本。Updates the current and original versions of the row with the value of the incoming row.| |`Upsert`|用传入行的值更新行的当前版本。Updates the current version of the row with the value of the incoming row.| 通常，`PreserveChanges` 和 `OverwriteChanges` 选项适用于用户需要在主数据源中同步 `DataSet` 及其更改的情况。In general, the `PreserveChanges` and `OverwriteChanges` options are intended for scenarios in which the user needs to synchronize the `DataSet` and its changes with the primary data source. `Upsert` 选项有助于聚合一个或多个辅助数据源中的更改。The `Upsert` option facilitates aggregating changes from one or more secondary data sources. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了调用 方法所涉及的几个问题。The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the method. 首先，该示例重点介绍架构问题，包括从加载的 推断架构，并处理不兼容的架构和缺少或其他列的架构。First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded , and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns. 然后，该示例重点介绍数据问题，包括处理各种加载选项。The example then focuses on data issues, including handling the various loading options. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 `Load`的重载版本之一。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of `Load`. 有关可能可用的其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableLoad#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableLoad/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 方法使用加载的 中的第一个结果集，成功完成后，将读取器的位置设置为下一个结果集（如果有）。The method consumes the first result set from the loaded , and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any. 转换数据时，`Load` 方法使用与 方法相同的转换规则。When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the method. 从 实例加载数据时， 方法必须考虑三个特定问题：架构、数据和事件操作。The method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an instance: schema, data, and event operations. 使用架构时， 方法可能会遇到下表中所述的情况。When working with the schema, the method may encounter conditions as described in the following table. 架构操作适用于所有导入的结果集，甚至包括不包含任何数据的结果集。The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data. |条件Condition|行为Behavior| |---------------|--------------| | 没有架构。The has no schema.| 方法根据导入的 中的结果集推断架构。The method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported .| | 有一个架构，但它与加载的架构不兼容。The has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.|当尝试将数据加载到不兼容的架构中时， 方法会引发与特定错误相关的异常。The method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.| |架构是兼容的，但加载的结果集架构包含 中不存在的列。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that do not exist in the .| 方法将额外的列添加到 `DataTable`的架构。The method adds the extra columns to `DataTable`'s schema. 如果 中的相应列和加载的结果集不是值兼容的，则该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the and the loaded result set are not value compatible. 方法还会从结果集中为所有已添加的列检索约束信息。The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns. 除了 Primary Key 约束的情况外，仅当当前 在加载操作开始时不包含任何列时，才使用此约束信息。Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.| |架构是兼容的，但加载的结果集架构包含的列少于 `DataTable`的列。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.|如果缺少的列定义了默认值，或者列的数据类型可以为 null，则 方法允许添加行，并用默认值或 `null` 值替换缺少的列。If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or `null` value for the missing column. 如果没有可用的默认值或 `null`，`Load` 方法将引发异常。If no default value or `null` can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception. 如果未提供特定的默认值，则 `Load` 方法使用 `null` 值作为隐含的默认值。If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the `null` value as the implied default value.| 在考虑数据操作的 `Load` 方法的行为之前，请考虑 中的每一行都同时维护每个列的当前值和原始值。Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a maintains both the current value and the original value for each column. 如果行中的数据自填满 `DataTable`后发生了更改，则这些值可能是等效的，也可能不同。These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[行状态和行版本](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions)。For more information, see [Row States and Row Versions](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions). 此版本的 `Load` 方法尝试保留每行中的当前值，并保持原始值不变。This version of the `Load` method attempts to preserve the current values in each row, leaving the original value intact. （如果想要更好地控制传入数据的行为，请参阅 。）如果现有行和传入行包含相应的主键值，则使用该行的当前行状态值处理该行，否则将其视为新行。(If you want finer control over the behavior of incoming data, see .) If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row. 就事件操作而言， 事件发生在每行更改之前，并在每行更改后发生 事件。In terms of event operations, the event occurs before each row is changed, and the event occurs after each row has been changed. 在每种情况下，传递到事件处理程序的 实例的 属性都包含与该事件相关联的特定操作的相关信息。In each case, the property of the instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event. 此操作值取决于加载操作前行的状态。This action value depends on the state of the row before the load operation. 在每种情况下，都会发生两个事件，每个事件的操作都是相同的。In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each. 此操作可应用于每行的当前版本或原始版本，也可应用于这两个行，具体取决于当前的行状态。The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state. 下表显示 `Load` 方法的行为。The following table displays behavior for the `Load` method. 最后一行（标记为 "（不存在）"）描述了与任何现有行不匹配的传入行的行为。The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row. 此表中的每个单元格介绍行中某个字段的当前值和原始值，以及 `Load` 方法完成后值的 。Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the for the value after the `Load` method has completed. 在这种情况下，该方法不允许指示 load 选项，并使用默认的 `PreserveChanges`。In this case, the method doesn't allow you to indicate the load option, and uses the default, `PreserveChanges`. |现有 DataRowStateExisting DataRowState|`Load` 方法后的值和事件操作Values after `Load` method, and event action| |---------------------------|--------------------------------------------------| |已添加Added|Current = \<现有 >Current = \

原始 = \<传入 >Original = \

状态 = \<修改 >State = \

RowAction = ChangeOriginalRowAction = ChangeOriginal| |修改时间Modified|Current = \<现有 >Current = \

原始 = \<传入 >Original = \

状态 = \<修改 >State = \

RowAction = ChangeOriginalRowAction = ChangeOriginal| |已删除Deleted|Current = \<不可用 >Current = \

原始 = \<传入 >Original = \

状态 = \<删除 >State = \

RowAction = ChangeOriginalRowAction = ChangeOriginal| |UnchangedUnchanged|Current = \<传入 >Current = \

原始 = \<传入 >Original = \

状态 = \<保持不变 >State = \

RowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginalRowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginal| |（不存在）(Not present)|Current = \<传入 >Current = \

原始 = \<传入 >Original = \

状态 = \<保持不变 >State = \

RowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginalRowAction = ChangeCurrentAndOriginal| 可以通过使用 和 等属性来限制 中的值。Values in a can be constrained through use of properties such as and . `Load` 方法处理此类列的方式与列的属性所定义的行为一致。The `Load` method handles such columns in a manner that is consistent with the behavior defined by the column's properties. 上的只读约束仅适用于内存中发生的更改。The read only constraint on a is applicable only for changes that occur in memory. 如果需要，`Load` 方法将覆盖只读列值。The `Load` method's overwrites the read-only column values, if needed. 若要确定要用于将当前行与传入行进行比较的主键字段的版本，`Load` 方法使用行中的主键值的原始版本（如果存在）。To determine which version of the primary key field to use for comparing the current row with an incoming row, the `Load` method uses the original version of the primary key value within a row, if it exists. 否则，`Load` 方法使用主键字段的当前版本。Otherwise, the `Load` method uses the current version of the primary key field. ## Examples 下面的示例演示了调用 方法所涉及的几个问题。The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the method. 首先，该示例重点介绍架构问题，包括从加载的 推断架构，并处理不兼容的架构和缺少或其他列的架构。First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded , and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns. 然后，该示例调用 `Load` 方法，并在加载操作前后显示数据。The example then calls the `Load` method, displaying the data both before and after the load operation. the processing of the incoming data. 这些问题和其他问题由 `loadOption` 参数控制。These issues, and more, are controlled by the `loadOption` parameter. 如果现有行和传入行包含相应的主键值，则使用该行的当前行状态值处理该行，否则将其视为新行。If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row. 就事件操作而言， 事件发生在每行更改之前，并在每行更改后发生 事件。In terms of event operations, the event occurs before each row is changed, and the event occurs after each row has been changed. 在每种情况下，传递到事件处理程序的 实例的 属性都包含与该事件相关联的特定操作的相关信息。In each case, the property of the instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event. 此操作值的变化取决于加载操作之前的行的状态。This action value varies, depending on the state of the row before the load operation. 在每种情况下，都会发生两个事件，每个事件的操作都是相同的。In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each. 此操作可应用于每行的当前版本或原始版本，也可应用于这两个行，具体取决于当前的行状态。The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state. 下表显示了在用每个 `LoadOption` 值调用时加载方法的行为，还显示了这些值如何与要加载的行的行状态交互。The following table displays behavior for the Load method when called with each of the `LoadOption` values, and also shows how the values interact with the row state for the row being loaded. 最后一行（标记为 "（不存在）"）描述了与任何现有行不匹配的传入行的行为。The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row. 此表中的每个单元格介绍行中某个字段的当前值和原始值，以及 `Load` 方法完成后值的 。Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the for the value after the `Load` method has completed. |现有 DataRowStateExisting DataRowState|UpsertUpsert|OverwriteChangesOverwriteChanges|PreserveChanges （默认行为）PreserveChanges (Default behavior)| |---------------------------|------------|----------------------|------------------------------------------| |已添加Added|Current = \<传入 >Current = \

`Load` method handles such columns in a manner that is consistent with the behavior defined by the column's properties. 上的只读约束仅适用于内存中发生的更改。The read only constraint on a is applicable only for changes that occur in memory. 如果需要，`Load` 方法将覆盖只读列值。The `Load` method's overwrites the read-only column values, if needed. 如果在调用 `Load` 方法时指定了 OverwriteChanges 或 PreserveChanges 选项，则假设传入的数据来自 `DataTable`的主数据源，并且 DataTable 跟踪更改，并可以将更改传播回数据源。If you specify the OverwriteChanges or PreserveChanges options when calling the `Load` method, then the assumption is made that the incoming data is coming from the `DataTable`'s primary data source, and the DataTable tracks changes and can propagate the changes back to the data source. 如果选择 "Upsert" 选项，则假定数据来自辅助数据源之一，如中间层组件提供的数据（可能由用户更改）。If you select the Upsert option, it is assumed that the data is coming from one of a secondary data source, such as data provided by a middle-tier component, perhaps altered by a user. 在这种情况下，假设目的是聚合来自 `DataTable`中的一个或多个数据源的数据，然后将数据传播回主数据源。In this case, the assumption is that the intent is to aggregate data from one or more data sources in the `DataTable`, and then perhaps propagate the data back to the primary data source. 参数用于确定要用于主键比较的行的特定版本。The parameter is used for determining the specific version of the row that is to be used for primary key comparison. 下表提供了详细信息。The table below provides the details. |Load 选项Load option|用于主键比较的 DataRow 版本DataRow version used for primary key comparison| |-----------------|-----------------------------------------------------| |`OverwriteChanges`|原始版本（如果存在），否则为当前版本Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version| |`PreserveChanges`|原始版本（如果存在），否则为当前版本Original version, if it exists, otherwise Current version| |`Upsert`|当前版本（如果存在），否则为原始版本Current version, if it exists, otherwise Original version| ## Examples 下面的示例演示了调用 方法所涉及的几个问题。The following example demonstrates several of the issues involved with calling the method. 首先，该示例重点介绍架构问题，包括从加载的 推断架构，并处理不兼容的架构和缺少或其他列的架构。First, the example focuses on schema issues, including inferring a schema from the loaded , and then handling incompatible schemas, and schemas with missing or additional columns. 然后，该示例重点介绍数据问题，包括处理各种加载选项。The example then focuses on data issues, including handling the various loading options. remarks.format:
## Remarks `Load` 方法使用加载的 中的第一个结果集，成功完成后，将读取器的位置设置为下一个结果集（如果有）。The `Load` method consumes the first result set from the loaded , and after successful completion, sets the reader's position to the next result set, if any. 转换数据时，`Load` 方法使用与 方法相同的转换规则。When converting data, the `Load` method uses the same conversion rules as the method. 从 实例加载数据时，`Load` 方法必须考虑三个特定问题：架构、数据和事件操作。The `Load` method must take into account three specific issues when loading the data from an instance: schema, data, and event operations. 使用架构时，`Load` 方法可能会遇到下表中所述的情况。When working with the schema, the `Load` method may encounter conditions as described in the following table. 架构操作适用于所有导入的结果集，甚至包括不包含任何数据的结果集。The schema operations take place for all imported result sets, even those containing no data. |条件Condition|行为Behavior| |---------------|--------------| | 没有架构。The has no schema.|`Load` 方法根据导入的 中的结果集推断架构。The `Load` method infers the schema based on the result set from the imported .| | 有一个架构，但它与加载的架构不兼容。The has a schema, but it is incompatible with the loaded schema.|当尝试将数据加载到不兼容的架构中时，`Load` 方法会引发与特定错误相关的异常。The `Load` method throws an exception corresponding to the particular error that occurs when attempting to load data into the incompatible schema.| |架构是兼容的，但加载的结果集架构包含 `DataTable`中不存在的列。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains columns that don't exist in the `DataTable`.|`Load` 方法将额外的列添加到 `DataTable`的架构。The `Load` method adds the extra column(s) to `DataTable`'s schema. 如果 中的相应列和加载的结果集不是值兼容的，则该方法将引发异常。The method throws an exception if corresponding columns in the and the loaded result set are not value compatible. 方法还会从结果集中为所有已添加的列检索约束信息。The method also retrieves constraint information from the result set for all added columns. 除了 Primary Key 约束的情况外，仅当当前 在加载操作开始时不包含任何列时，才使用此约束信息。Except for the case of Primary Key constraint, this constraint information is used only if the current does not contain any columns at the start of the load operation.| |架构是兼容的，但加载的结果集架构包含的列少于 `DataTable`的列。The schemas are compatible, but the loaded result set schema contains fewer columns than does the `DataTable`.|如果缺少的列定义了默认值，或者列的数据类型可以为 null，则 `Load` 方法允许添加行，并将缺少的列替换为默认值或 null 值。If a missing column has a default value defined or the column's data type is nullable, the `Load` method allows the rows to be added, substituting the default or null value for the missing column. 如果没有可用的默认值或 null 值，则 `Load` 方法会引发异常。If no default value or null can be used, then the `Load` method throws an exception. 如果未提供任何特定的默认值，`Load` 方法将使用 null 值作为隐含的默认值。If no specific default value has been supplied, the `Load` method uses the null value as the implied default value.| 在考虑数据操作的 `Load` 方法的行为之前，请考虑 中的每一行都同时维护每个列的当前值和原始值。Before considering the behavior of the `Load` method in terms of data operations, consider that each row within a maintains both the current value and the original value for each column. 如果行中的数据自填满 `DataTable`后发生了更改，则这些值可能是等效的，也可能不同。These values may be equivalent, or may be different if the data in the row has been changed since filling the `DataTable`. 有关详细信息，请参阅[行状态和行版本](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions)。See [Row States and Row Versions](/dotnet/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/row-states-and-row-versions) for more information. 在此方法调用中，指定的 参数会影响传入数据的处理。In this method call, the specified parameter influences the processing of the incoming data. Load 方法如何处理与现有行具有相同主键的行？How should the Load method handle loading rows that have the same primary key as existing rows? 它应同时修改当前值、原始值还是同时修改两者？Should it modify current values, original values, or both? 这些问题和其他问题由 `loadOption` 参数控制。These issues, and more, are controlled by the `loadOption` parameter. 如果现有行和传入行包含相应的主键值，则使用该行的当前行状态值处理该行，否则将其视为新行。If the existing row and the incoming row contain corresponding primary key values, the row is processed using its current row state value, otherwise it's treated as a new row. 就事件操作而言， 事件发生在每行更改之前，并在每行更改后发生 事件。In terms of event operations, the event occurs before each row is changed, and the event occurs after each row has been changed. 在每种情况下，传递到事件处理程序的 实例的 属性都包含与该事件相关联的特定操作的相关信息。In each case, the property of the instance passed to the event handler contains information about the particular action associated with the event. 此操作值的变化取决于加载操作之前的行的状态。This action value varies, depending on the state of the row before the load operation. 在每种情况下，都会发生两个事件，每个事件的操作都是相同的。In each case, both events occur, and the action is the same for each. 此操作可应用于每行的当前版本或原始版本，也可应用于这两个行，具体取决于当前的行状态。The action may be applied to either the current or original version of each row, or both, depending on the current row state. 下表显示了在用每个 `LoadOption` 值调用时加载方法的行为，还显示了这些值如何与要加载的行的行状态交互。The following table displays behavior for the Load method when called with each of the `LoadOption` values, and also shows how the values interact with the row state for the row being loaded. 最后一行（标记为 "（不存在）"）描述了与任何现有行不匹配的传入行的行为。The final row (labeled "(Not present)") describes the behavior for incoming rows that don't match any existing row. 此表中的每个单元格介绍行中某个字段的当前值和原始值，以及 `Load` 方法完成后值的 。Each cell in this table describes the current and original value for a field within a row, along with the for the value after the `Load` method has completed. |现有 DataRowStateExisting DataRowState|UpsertUpsert|OverwriteChangesOverwriteChanges|PreserveChanges （默认行为）PreserveChanges (Default behavior)| |---------------------------|------------|----------------------|------------------------------------------| |已添加Added|Current = \<传入 >Current = \

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法采用值的数组，并查找主键列中的匹配值。The method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s). 如果列具有默认值，请在数组中传递 null 值，以设置该列的默认值。If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column. 同样，如果列的 属性设置为 true，则在数组中传递 null 值，以便为该行设置自动生成的值。Similarly, if a column has its property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row. 如果 `fAcceptChanges` 参数 `true` 或未指定，则会添加新数据，然后调用 ，以接受 中的所有更改;如果 `false`参数，新添加的行将被标记为插入，对现有行所做的更改将被标记为修改。If the `fAcceptChanges` parameter is `true` or not specified, the new data is added and then is called to accept all changes in the ; if the argument is `false`, newly added rows are marked as insertions, and changes to existing rows are marked as modifications. 或 事件期间也可能发生异常。Exceptions can also occur during either a or event. 如果发生异常，则不会将行添加到表中。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. 将 与 和 结合使用。Use in conjunction with and . ## Examples 下面的示例使用 方法尝试查找行。The following example uses the method to attempt to find a row. 如果找不到这样的行，则将使用这些值来创建新行。If no such row is found, the values are used to create a new row. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法采用值的数组，并查找主键列中的匹配值。The method takes an array of values and finds the matching value(s) in the primary key column(s). 如果列具有默认值，请在数组中传递 null 值，以设置该列的默认值。If a column has a default value, pass a null value in the array to set the default value for that column. 同样，如果列的 属性设置为 true，则在数组中传递 null 值，以便为该行设置自动生成的值。Similarly, if a column has its property set to true, pass a null value in the array to set the automatically generated value for the row. `loadOption` 参数的值用于确定数组中的值如何应用于现有行。The value of the `loadOption` parameter is used to determine how the values in the array are applied to an existing row. 例如，如果 `loadOption` 设置为 `OverwriteChanges`，则每列的 `Original` 和 `Current` 值将替换为传入行中的值，并且 `RowState` 属性将设置为 `Unchanged`。For example, if `loadOption` is set to `OverwriteChanges`, the `Original` and `Current` values of each column are replaced with the values in the incoming row and the `RowState` property is set to `Unchanged`. 或 事件期间也可能发生异常。Exceptions can also occur during either a or event. 如果发生异常，则不会将行添加到表中。If an exception occurs, the row is not added to the table. 将 与 和 结合使用。Use in conjunction with and .

remarks.format: ## Remarks `Merge` 方法用于合并两个大体类似架构的 对象。The `Merge` method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 通常在客户端应用程序上使用合并，以将数据源中的最新更改合并到现有 中。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 这允许客户端应用程序使用数据源中的最新数据进行刷新 。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. Merge 操作仅考虑原始表和要合并的表。The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged. 不会影响或包含子表。Child tables are not affected or included. 如果表具有一个或多个子表（定义为关系的一部分），则每个子表都必须单独合并。If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示了 方法的 `missingSchemaAction` 参数的行为。The following console application demonstrates the behavior of the `missingSchemaAction` parameter of the method. 此示例将创建同一个表的两个版本，并修改第二个版本的架构。This example creates two versions of the same table, modifying the schema for the second version. 然后，该代码会尝试将第二个表合并为第一个表。The code then attempts to merge the second table into the first. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用合并的重载版本之一。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of Merge. 有关可能可用的其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTableMergeOverload/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks Merge 方法用于合并两个大体类似架构的 对象。The Merge method is used to merge two objects that have largely similar schemas. 通常在客户端应用程序上使用合并，以将数据源中的最新更改合并到现有 中。A merge is typically used on a client application to incorporate the latest changes from a data source into an existing . 这允许客户端应用程序使用数据源中的最新数据进行刷新 。This allows the client application to have a refreshed with the latest data from the data source. Merge 操作仅考虑原始表和要合并的表。The merge operation takes into account only the original table, and the table to be merged. 不会影响或包含子表。Child tables are not affected or included. 如果表具有一个或多个子表（定义为关系的一部分），则每个子表都必须单独合并。If a table has one or more child tables, defined as part of a relationship, each child table must be merged individually. 通常在一系列过程的末尾调用 `Merge` 方法，这些过程涉及验证更改、协调错误、使用更改更新数据源，最后刷新现有 。The `Merge` method is typically called at the end of a series of procedures that involve validating changes, reconciling errors, updating the data source with the changes, and finally refreshing the existing . 执行合并时，默认情况下，合并操作期间将保留对现有数据所做的更改。When performing a merge, changes made to the existing data before the merge are preserved by default during the merge operation. 开发人员可以通过调用此方法的其他两个重载之一来修改此行为，并为 `preserveChanges` 参数指定 false 值。Developers can modify this behavior by calling one of the other two overloads for this method, and specifying a false value for the `preserveChanges` parameter. 在客户端应用程序中，通常会有一个按钮，用户可以单击该按钮来收集更改的数据并对其进行验证，然后再将其发送回中间层组件。In a client application, it is usual to have a single button that the user can click that gathers the changed data and validates it before sending it back to a middle tier component. 在此方案中，首先调用 方法。In this scenario, the method is first invoked. 该方法将返回第二个针对验证和合并进行优化 。That method returns a second optimized for validating and merging. 此第二个 对象只包含已更改的 对象，导致原始 的子集。This second object contains only the objects that were changed, resulting in a subset of the original . 此子集通常较小，因此更有效地传递回中间层组件。This subset is generally smaller and thus more efficiently passed back to a middle tier component. 然后，中间层组件使用存储过程中的更改来更新原始数据源。The middle tier component then updates the original data source with the changes through stored procedures. 然后，中间层可以发回包含原始数据的新 和数据源中的最新数据（再次运行原始查询），也可以将其从数据源中所做的任何更改发送回。The middle tier can then send back either a new that includes original data and the latest data from the data source (by running the original query again), or it can send back the subset with any changes that have been made to it from the data source. （例如，如果数据源自动创建唯一的主键值，则这些值可以传播回客户端应用程序。）在任一情况下，返回的 都可以与 方法一起合并回客户端应用程序的原始 。(For example, if the data source automatically creates unique primary key values, these values can be propagated back to the client application.) In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 在将新的源 合并到目标时， 值为 `Unchanged`、`Modified`或 `Deleted`的任何源行都将与具有相同的主键值的目标行匹配。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted`, is matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 值为 `Added` 的源行与新源行的主键值相同的新目标行匹配。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. ## Examples 以下控制台应用程序创建一个简单的 ，并将数据添加到表中。The following console application creates a simple and adds data to the table. 然后，该示例将创建表的副本，并向副本添加行。The example then creates a copy of the table, adding rows to the copy. 最后，该示例调用 方法，将第二个表中的数据与第一个表中的数据合并。Finally, the example calls the method to merge the data in the second table with the data in the first table. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.Merge#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.Merge/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.Merge#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.Merge/VB/source.vb#1)]

In either case, the returned can be merged back into the client application's original with the method. 调用 方法时，将比较两个 对象的架构，因为架构可能已更改。When the method is called, the schemas of the two objects are compared, because it is possible that the schemas may have been changed. 例如，在企业对企业方案中，可能已通过自动化过程将新列添加到了 XML 架构。For example, in a business-to-business scenario, new columns may have been added to an XML schema by an automated process. 如果源 包含目标中缺少的架构元素（添加 对象），则可以通过将 `missingSchemaAction` 参数设置为 `MissingSchemaAction.Add`来将架构元素添加到目标。If the source contains schema elements (added objects) that are missing in the target, the schema elements can be added to the target by setting the `missingSchemaAction` argument to `MissingSchemaAction.Add`. 在这种情况下，合并的 包含添加的架构和数据。In that case, the merged contains the added schema and data. 合并架构后，数据将合并。After merging schemas, the data is merged. 在将新的源 合并到目标时， 值为 `Unchanged`、`Modified`或 `Deleted` 的任何源行都将与具有相同的主键值的目标行匹配。When merging a new source into the target, any source rows with a value of `Unchanged`, `Modified`, or `Deleted` are matched to target rows with the same primary key values. 值为 `Added` 的源行与新源行的主键值相同的新目标行匹配。Source rows with a value of `Added` are matched to new target rows with the same primary key values as the new source rows. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序演示了 方法的 `missingSchemaAction` 参数的行为。The following console application demonstrates the behavior of the `missingSchemaAction` parameter of the method. 此示例将创建同一个表的两个版本，并修改第二个版本的架构。This example creates two versions of the same table, modifying the schema for the second version. 然后，该代码会尝试将第二个表合并为第一个表。The code then attempts to merge the second table into the first. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.MergeMissingSchemaAction/VB/source.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 表的主键必须唯一，以标识表中的记录。The primary key of a table must be unique to identify the record in the table. 还可以有一个表，其中的主键由两列或更多列组成。It's also possible to have a table with a primary key made up of two or more columns. 当单列不能包含足够的唯一值时，会发生这种情况。This occurs when a single column can't contain enough unique values. 例如，两个列的主键可能由 "FirstName" 和 "LastName" 列组成。For example, a two column primary key might consist of a "FirstName" and "LastName" column. 由于主键可以由多个列组成，因此 属性包含一个 对象的数组。Because primary keys can be made up of more than one column, the property consists of an array of objects. ## Examples 第一个示例演示如何为 `DataGrid`中显示的 返回主键列。The first example shows how to return the primary key columns for a displayed in a `DataGrid`. 第二个示例演示如何设置 的主键列。The second example demonstrates how to set the primary key columns for a . identical to that of the method, except that in this case, data is loaded only for the current table and its descendants. 方法提供一种方法，用于仅从 XML 文档读取数据或将数据和架构读入 ，而 方法只读取架构。The method provides a way to read either data only, or both data and schema into a from an XML document, whereas the method reads only the schema. 请注意， 和 方法的情况都是相同的。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 若要从 `DataTable`写入 XML 数据或架构和数据，请使用 `WriteXml` 方法。To write XML data, or both schema and data from the `DataTable`, use the `WriteXml` method. 若要只写入架构，请使用 `WriteXmlSchema` 方法。To write just the schema, use the `WriteXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . 如果指定了内嵌架构，则在加载数据之前，使用内联架构来扩展现有的关系结构。If an in-line schema is specified, the in-line schema is used to extend the existing relational structure prior to loading the data. 如果存在任何冲突（例如，使用不同的数据类型定义的同一表中的同一列），则会引发异常。If there are any conflicts (for example, the same column in the same table defined with different data types) an exception is raised. 如果未指定内联架构，根据 XML 文档的结构，将根据需要通过推理扩展关系结构。If no in-line schema is specified, the relational structure is extended through inference, as necessary, according to the structure of the XML document. 如果无法通过推理扩展架构以便公开所有数据，则会引发异常。If the schema cannot be extended through inference in order to expose all data, an exception is raised. > [!NOTE] > 当在序列化的 XML 中转义类似于（"_"）的合法 XML 字符时，`DataSet` 不会将 XML 元素与其相应的 `DataColumn` 或 `DataTable` 相关联。The `DataSet` does not associate an XML element with its corresponding `DataColumn` or `DataTable` when legal XML characters like ("_") are escaped in the serialized XML. `DataSet` 本身只是转义 XML 元素名称中的非法 XML 字符，因此只能使用同一个。The `DataSet` itself only escapes illegal XML characters in XML element names and hence can only consume the same. 当转义 XML 元素名称中的法律字符时，将在处理时忽略元素。When legal characters in XML element name are escaped, the element is ignored while processing. ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个包含两列和10行的 。The following example creates a containing two columns and ten rows. 该示例通过调用 方法将 架构和数据写入内存流。The example writes the schema and data to a memory stream, by invoking the method. 该示例创建了第二个 ，并调用 方法以使用架构和数据填充它。The example creates a second and calls the method to fill it with schema and data. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法为 创建架构。Use the method to create the schema for a . 此架构包括表、关系和约束定义。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 若要将架构写入 XML 文档，请使用 方法。To write a schema to an XML document, use the method. 根据 XSD 标准解释 XML 架构。The XML schema is interpreted according to the XSD standard. 如果 msdata： DataType 和 xs： type 类型不匹配，则可能发生数据损坏。Data corruption can occur if the msdata:DataType and the xs:type types do not match. 不会引发异常。No exception will be thrown. 通常调用 `ReadXmlSchema` 方法，然后调用用于填充 的 方法。The `ReadXmlSchema` method is generally invoked before invoking the method which is used to fill the . 若要使用 XML 架构创建嵌套关系，请使用隐式嵌套元素。To create a nested relation using XML schema, use implicit nested elements. 您还可以将嵌套关系配置为使用显式列名称。You can also configure the nested relation to use explicit column names. 为了使相应的数据表参与嵌套关系，必须隐式嵌套元素。Elements must be implicitly nested in order for the corresponding DataTables to participate in a nested relation. ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序创建一个新 ，并将该表的架构写入 。The following console application creates a new , and writes the schema for that table to a . 然后，该示例创建一个新的 ，并从保存的 XML 架构读取其架构。Then, the example creates a new and reads its schema from the saved XML schema. remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法提供一种方法，用于将数据（或从 中的数据和架构）写入 XML 文档，而 方法只写入架构。The method provides a way to write either data only, or both data and schema from a into an XML document, whereas the method writes only the schema. 若要同时编写数据和架构，请使用包含 参数的重载之一，并将其值设置为 `WriteSchema`。To write both data and schema, use one of the overloads that include the parameter, and set its value to `WriteSchema`. 请注意， 和 方法的情况都是相同的。Note that the same is true for the and methods, respectively. 若要将 XML 数据或架构和数据都读入到 `DataTable`，请使用 `ReadXml` 方法。To read XML data, or both schema and data into the `DataTable`, use the `ReadXml` method. 若要仅读取架构，请使用 `ReadXmlSchema` 方法。To read just the schema, use the `ReadXmlSchema` method. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement . ## Examples 下面的控制台应用程序创建两个 实例，将每个实例添加到 中，创建一个与两个表关联的 ，然后使用 方法将父表中包含的数据写入 。The following console application creates two instances, adds each to a , creates a relating the two tables, and then uses the method to write the data contained within the parent table to a . 该示例演示将 `writeHierarchy` 参数设置为其每个值时的行为。The example demonstrates the behavior when setting the `writeHierarchy` parameter to each of its values. > [!NOTE] > 此示例演示如何使用 WriteXml 的重载版本之一。This example shows how to use one of the overloaded versions of WriteXml. 有关可能可用的其他示例，请参阅各个重载主题。For other examples that might be available, see the individual overload topics. [!code-csharp[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/DataWorks DataTable.WriteXmlOverload/VB/source.vb#1)] 该示例在控制台窗口中显示以下输出：The example displays the following output in the console window: ``` ============================== Customer table, without hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ ============================== Customer table, with hierarchy ============================== 1 Mary 2 Andy 3 Peter 4 Russ 1 1 2003-12-02T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 2 1 2004-01-03T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 3 2 2004-11-13T00:00:00.0000000-08:00 4 3 2004-05-16T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 5 3 2004-05-22T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 6 4 2004-06-15T00:00:00.0000000-07:00 ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将 的架构写入 XML 文档。Use the method to write the schema for a to an XML document. 此架构包括表、关系和约束定义。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 使用 XSD 标准编写 XML 架构。The XML schema is written using the XSD standard. 若要将数据写入 XML 文档，请使用 方法。To write the data to an XML document, use the method. 通常，`WriteXml` 方法只写入当前表的数据。Normally the `WriteXml` method writes the data only for the current table. 若要写入当前表及其所有子代的相关表的数据，请调用方法，将 `writeHierarchy` 参数设置为 `true`。To write the data for the current table and all of its descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`. > [!NOTE] > 如果读取或写入 `DataRow` 中的列类型以实现 但未实现 ，则会引发 。An will be thrown if a column type in the `DataRow` being read from or written to implements and does not implement .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用 方法将 的架构写入 XML 文档。Use the method to write the schema for a to an XML document. 此架构包括表、关系和约束定义。The schema includes table, relation, and constraint definitions. 使用 XSD 标准编写 XML 架构。The XML schema is written using the XSD standard. 若要将数据写入 XML 文档，请使用 方法。To write the data to an XML document, use the method. 通常，`WriteXmlSchema` 方法只写入当前表的架构。Normally the `WriteXmlSchema` method writes the schema only for the current table. 若要写入当前表及其整个子代的相关表的架构，请调用方法，将 `writeHierarchy` 参数设置为 `true`。To write the schema for the current table and its entire descendant, related tables, call the method with the `writeHierarchy` parameter set to `true`.
